question: PUSA decontamination and sanitizing tunnel', which was inaugurated recently, has been developed by which research organisation?
explanation:
The New Delhi-based ICAR- Indian Agricultural Research Institute, which is commonly known as the Pusa Institute, has recently developed 'PUSA decontamination and sanitizing tunnel'.
The government research institute has developed the tunnel in New Delhi. It has a hand-washing set-up using soap and water dispenser, operated by foot. The tunnel uses Quaternary Ammonium Compounds (QAC) at recommended concentration.
